argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | topnval.1 | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | topnval.2 | |- J = ( TopSet ` W ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_topnval | |- ( J |`t B ) = ( TopOpen ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` W ) e. _V |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 6 |  | #P_restid2 | |- ( ( B e. _V /\ J C_ ~P B ) -> ( J |`t B ) = J ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_mpan | |- ( J C_ ~P B -> ( J |`t B ) = J ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_syl5reqr | |- ( J C_ ~P B -> J = ( TopOpen ` W ) ) |
